Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier track switching problems at Harlem/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier track switching problems at Harlem/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
